website_summaries.verdict: The Asics Gel Patriot 10 has excellently delivered function and comfort through its various technologies that proved efficient to users. This Asics running shoe was an excellent update that many runners were able to appreciate, especially to those who are familiar to the Patriot series.
pros: Several runners thought that the Asics Gel Patriot 10 was a comfortable running shoe
Others claimed that wearing the shoe felt like “running on clouds.”
A reviewer said the shoe helped reduce the pain on their foot and knee
The Gel Patriot 10 was lightweight, according to a number of users
Some also noted how the shoe contributed to their speed
Many buyers commented about the shoe’s excellent design, while others were pleased that the colors go well with many outfits
Some customers appreciated the Gel Patriot 10’s affordable price
One user mentioned the shoe’s efficacy on many types of surfaces
cons: Despite the correct fit, the shoe kept rubbing uncomfortably against the right side of the foot, a wearer relayed
One runner said it provided less arch support compared to the previous version

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after knackering my previous pair of running shoes as it was time to hang them up for good. I am writing this review after 3 months of continuous use. These were a breath of fresh air by comparison to my old pair of another brand and has made running pleasurable again. Comfortable and light on the feet yet sturdy, as in they feel like they will not come apart any time soon despite wear and tear. I am considering buying a different model from Asics to have on rotation
customer_reviews.author: Rohan

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent running shoe, very light and very breathable material allows air flow to pass through nicely. They are very comfortable to wear and have never suffered any blisters as of yet wearing them. I use these for regular 10-15k runs with no problems what so ever! If you are on a budget these are an excellent option or even if you are just starting out as a newbie these make a good choice! Fast service and delivery from the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Agent Slippy Trippy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and endurable
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers at a good price. Bought for a half marathon in a few months time. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: nice looking trainers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. They are lighweight and very comfortable. This is the second pair that I have bought in a different colour. Good price and long lasting. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Had these running shoes for a week or so now and taken them on a few 5-10k runs in that time. They’ve been excellent so far, they feel very light when running but also offer a good level of padding and support which massively takes the strain off the joints. They’re very comfortable and also very breathable so even on hot days your feet don’t get too hot while running which is good. Got to say this is my first pair of ASICS I’ve owned and they’re probably the best running shoes I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with them. Did a half marathon after only wearing them for about 9 miles & had no pain or problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shoe. Brought to wear on holiday in orlando. So comfortable. would buy again. I suffer with plantar fasciitis and these helped a lot. Can't comment on running use, Too old for that.
customer_reviews.author: DDH

customer_reviews.title: Cuts on the back of my foot
customer_reviews.text: Not a great fit. After my first gym session I have small cuts on the back of my foot. The design of these isn’t great. The size 8.5 I got maybe very slightly big for me compared to other 8.5s I’ve had. Just not a good quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Great low cost trainers but check size
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these trainers though had to return first pair as too large. Normally I order size 9.5 uk which is usually size 44 euro but with these it's 44.5 euro so had to return & order size 9 uk (which are size 44 euro) which fit perfectly! Very comfortable & stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Neo

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes at a good sensible price
customer_reviews.text: Well made good colour should be able to to the job and last a decent length of time.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected, but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to wearing the Asics GT series of trainers - buying these I thought I could use them for the gym instead of going through the GT series of trainers, but these are nowhere near as comfortable to wear or walk/run in. I understand that comparing a £30 trainer to one that is £100+ may be unfair, but in my opinion, it is worth spending the extra money for the comfort, especially if you are on the heavier side like my self!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, light and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable pair of running shoes, with a decent heel/toe drop. Very light, although obviously you get pay more for even lighter ones. I've used Asics for years, and these are one of the best shoes I've bought from them. Considerably better than a much more expensive pair I purchased earlier in the year. Buying another pair for when these ones have seen better days.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've seen some people trash these, but honestly, they feel super comfortable for the affordability. I use them for basic training and I love them. The colour really pops in reality.
customer_reviews.author: James.Hutt

customer_reviews.title: Good value and good quality
customer_reviews.text: True to size. Wide enough for my wide feet. Comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: A good running shoe at a discount price, a absolute bargain in my opinion. It has exceeded my expectations at fraction of the cost expected. Good sturdy support, has a decent grip for slightly wet conditions. The shoe is light weight and is soft cushioned linen inside.
customer_reviews.author: James Jean

customer_reviews.title: Top quality at low price.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe at an amazing price. Can't go wrong with Asiçs
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for general use not for running and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID KNIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Got a hole in them after 4 weeks on top of trainer where toes go
customer_reviews.author: Stubbo

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and light. A bit on the large size in compare to other asics running shoes. Reasonably priced currently
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Kravitz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good style running shoe Excellent value for money Stylish shoe
customer_reviews.author: David fotheringham

customer_reviews.title: really comfortable walking and running
customer_reviews.text: brilliant light weight replaced Acis Patriot 8 as worn out
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight trainers at good price. Fit comfortably at my normal size. Ideal for what I want them for, ie gym workout/treadmill etc. Look good as well.
customer_reviews.author: The Blade

customer_reviews.title: Top Product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Value, Fantastic Product, Speedy delivery, what is there not to like
customer_reviews.author: well if only one person's loves it then is it a good app

customer_reviews.title: Crap running shoes
customer_reviews.text: No gel to absorb shock and impact wen running and lacking grip on soles of shoes
customer_reviews.author: Timothy McGeever

customer_reviews.title: Light and looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the patriot 8 a couple of years ago and was that impressed with them went for a similar pair this year 😄
customer_reviews.author: M KELLY

customer_reviews.title: good to go from the box
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe for walking , comfortable and durable running maybe not ao good for longer distances Good value
customer_reviews.author: Marcel Graves

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They are a great trainer , so comfortable and I managed to knock a min off my pb at park run with there help
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Lower than the 7, 8 or 9 in the heel so no good for running (for me anyway!) so I'm wearing them as casual wear which they're good at.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Willis

customer_reviews.title: Trainers
customer_reviews.text: There are 3 items in returned box, not sure if refunded for 3
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Lister

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Patriot 10 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The Asics Patriot 10 is a comfortable pair of high-top sneakers that offer good breathability to make your workout more comfortable. It gives greater stability and the special EVA midsole improves cushioning, giving more comfort during training. The innovative Amplifoam material on the sole improves cushioning, durability and stroke.PATRIOT 10, running, stability, cushioning
feature_bullets: Reduced Overlays - Add lightweight support and structure.
Internal Heel Counter - Secures the rearfoot.
Removable EVA Sockliner - Extra, optional layer of step-in comfort and support.
AmpliFoam Midsole - Offers durable, lightweight and flexible underfoot cushioning.
